00033 
00034 // types
00035 typedef map<string,string> StringMap;
00036 typedef map<string,long int> StringLIntMap;
00037 typedef map<string,vector<long int> > StringVecLIntMap;
00038 
00039 // choose container type for interval set (vector, list or array)
00040 typedef GenomicIntervalSetAsVector GenomicIntervalSet;
00041 //typedef GenomicIntervalSetAsList GenomicIntervalSet;
00042 //typedef GenomicIntervalSetAsArray GenomicIntervalSet;
00043 
00044 // for buffer in SortedGenomicRegionSetOverlaps
00045 typedef list<GenomicRegion *> GenomicRegionList;

00051 const char fragCIGARop[] = "MIS=X";

00308 {

00312 
00314 
00348   Chromosomes(char *map_dir, char *map_name);
00349 
00350 
00352 
00368   Chromosomes(char *fasta_file, bool verbose);
00369 
00370   
00372   ~Chromosomes();
00373   
00374 
00376   bool FindChromosome(char *chromosome_name);
00377   
00378   
00380   char *GetSeq(GenomicInterval *I, bool replace=false);
00381   
00382   
00384   void PrintSeq(GenomicInterval *I, bool replace=false);
00385   
00386   
00388   size_t GetSeqLength(GenomicInterval *I);
00389   
00390   
00392   void LoadChromosome(string chromosome_name);
00393 
00394   
00395   // data
00396 
00397   bool verbose;                                         
00398   bool load_in_memory;                                  
00399   StringMap map;                                        
00400   string map_dir;                                       
00401   string map_name;                                      
00402   string current_chromosome_name;                       
00403   size_t current_chromosome_size;

00405   ChromosomeSeqData chromosome_seq_data;                
00406 };

00428 // CLASS: GenomicIntervalSetAsArray                                                            //
00429 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00431 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00432 
00433 class GenomicIntervalSetAsArray
00434 {
00435  public:
00436   typedef GenomicInterval** iterator;                           
00437   typedef GenomicInterval** reverse_iterator;           
00438 
00439 
00441   GenomicIntervalSetAsArray();
00442 
00443 
00445   ~GenomicIntervalSetAsArray();
00446   
00447   
00449   iterator begin() { return &I[0]; }
00450   
00451 
00453   iterator end() { return &I[n_intervals]; }
00454   
00455 
00457   iterator rbegin() { return &I[n_intervals-1]; }
00458   
00459 
00461   iterator rend() { return &I[-1]; }
00462   
00463 
00465   GenomicInterval *front() { return I[0]; }
00466   
00467 
00469   GenomicInterval *back() { return I[n_intervals-1]; }
00470   
00471 
00473   size_t size() { return n_intervals; }
00474   
00475 
00477   void push_back(GenomicInterval *j) { I[n_intervals++] = j; }
00478   
00479 
00481   void clear() {  }
00482   
00483 
00485   iterator erase(iterator i, iterator j) { fprintf(stderr, "Error: [GenomicIntervalArray]: array entries cannot be erased!"); exit(1); return i; }
00486 
00487 
00489   iterator erase(iterator i) { fprintf(stderr, "Error: [GenomicIntervalArray]: array entries cannot be erased!"); exit(1); return i; }
00490   
00491 
00493   iterator insert(iterator i, GenomicInterval *u) { fprintf(stderr, "Error: [GenomicIntervalArray]: array entries cannot be inserted!"); exit(1); return i; }
00494   
00495 
00496   
00497   //------------------------------------------------------//
00498   //   Data                                               //
00499   //------------------------------------------------------//
00500   
00501   long int n_intervals;                                 
00502   long int max_intervals;                               
00503   GenomicInterval **I;                                  
00504   
00505 };
00506

00522 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00523 // CLASS: GenomicRegion                                                                        //
00524 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00525 //                                                                                             //
00526 // Input formats:                                                                              //
00527 //  1. LABEL <TAB> CHROMOSOME STRAND START[,START]* STOP[,STOP]*                               //
00528 //  2. LABEL <TAB> [CHROMOSOME STRAND START STOP]+                                             //
00529 //                                                                                             //
00530 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00532 
00541 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
